name: Fragile: Handle with care (Francesco Lenolli)
description:
Project made for the 2022 Global Game Jam in 48hrs. Unfortunately the web build had some issues that weren't in the PC build, so the animations that play when completing the game are not visible.

You can see the game on the Global Game Jame website, where you can find a link to the Github repository, a zip with the source code and another zip with a build playable on PC.
